title: lands under various reservations for public purposes, new roads, road widening etc
clause_text: lands under various reservations for public purposes, new roads, road widening etc. which are subjected to acquisition, proposed in Draft or Final Development Plan, prepared under the provisions of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act,1966;
section: CASES ELIGIBLE FOR TRANSFERABLE DEVELOPMENT RIGHTS (TDR):-
